scrapers.name: 4kHubDad
scrapers.description: 4kHubDad provider for Nuvio. Extracts HLS/MP4 streams from 4khdhub-style mirrors.
scrapers.author: kotlin

scrapers.name: MoviesDrive
scrapers.description: MoviesDrive provider for Nuvio. Uses multi-step extraction for direct and embed-based streams.
scrapers.author: kotlin

scrapers.name: Vegamovies
scrapers.description: Vegamovies provider for Nuvio. Supports multiple mirrors and dynamic iframe extraction.
scrapers.author: kotlin
